蜻蛉目.definition: Odonata, order consisting of about 6,000 species of dragonflies and damselflies

蜻蜓撼石柱.definition: lit. the dragon-fly shakes the stone tower (idiom); fig. to overestimate one's capabilities

蜻蜓目.definition: Odonata, order consisting of about 6,000 species of dragonflies and damselflies

蜻蜓點水.definition: lit. the dragonfly touches the water lightly; superficial contact (idiom)
